SEARCH
Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.lupus.rest

Interface RestResource

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRR, AddFriendRR, DeleteFriendRR, GameActionsGetRR, GameActionsPostRR, GameLogGetRR, GamePlayersRR, GameSettingsGetRR, GameSettingsPostRR, GameStatusRR, ListFriendsRR, SearchPlayerRR, UserLogsGetRR, UserMeDeleteRR, UserMePutRR, UserStatisticGetRR, UserUsernameGetRR
public interface RestResource
Represents a REST resource that can serve a REST request.

1.0

    • serve

      void serve() throws IOException
      Serves a REST request.
      Throws:
      IOException - if any error occurs in the client/server communication.
